title: Cool tip to help with FPS
body: I never knew about this, but it has to do with the Xbox app. Sign in the app with your hotmail or Xbox account then go to settings and look for DVR or game DVR i forgot which one it was. Turn this feature off. What that does is it stops recording your games while you play which can chunk on performance. I never knew about this so props to Riot for telling me this! Hope this helps just a little bit guys! :)

It won't increase it, it helps stabalise it much better. The only way to actually increase FPS is to buy a high end graphics card and to be on the latest drivers. Hope that helps

No no lol! Let me tell you again :)
Go to cortana and search Xbox. Log in either with your hotmail or xbox account. Then click the settings on the left hand side. You should see a tab called "game DVR" go into that and make sure you click it off. This will stop recording games you play as it chuncks on performance as I said :) it will help stabalise your fps. The only way to increase your fps is like I said is to buy a high end graphics card! Hope this helps :)
